infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Aura AI needs access to your photo library to allow you to select photos for analysis and generation.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Aura AI needs access to your camera to let you take photos for AI generation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Aura AI needs access to your microphone for video features.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Aura AI to access your photos to save your edits.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Aura AI to save your generated images to your gallery.

plugins.photosPermission: Aura AI needs access to your photos so you can choose which one to edit.
plugins.cameraPermission: Aura AI needs access to the camera to take a picture to edit.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Aura AI to access the microphone.
